home.contact:
Basically, I can respond by joining my Discord server and contacting me there, or by direct messaging me on Discord.
I might not notice them when I am out, so if it's urgent, please send me an email instead.

I no longer play Wii U Edition and Bedrock Edition, I currently play the Java Edition. On the Wii U Edition,
I was building frequently. Since i started Bedrock Edition,
I have been developing add-ons and shader packs but i got sick of Bedrock Edition because of the repeated

music.listen: I like piano music in the classical era and romantic era, and i especially listen to Franz Liszt's pieces.

I play classical music on the piano but not very good at it.
And i quickly get tired of piano practice, so i'm often satisfied with playing only some of my favorite melodies.
